properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Agentic AI integration.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.aiagent.outbound-connector.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the AI Agent outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.ad-hoc-tools-schema-resolver.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the Ad-hoc tools schema outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.client.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the MCP Client outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.remote-client.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the MCP Remote Client outbound connector.
